item.title: Hole on Stockwell Road pavement, nothing happening, 14th July

item.title: Constant marijuana smoking, 14th July

item.title: Street light STILL not working!, 14th July
item.description:
This important street light has been out for some time now. This is particularly dangerous, as this illuminates an otherwise pitch black alleyway leading to numbers 56, 54, and 52 Rowanwood Avenue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50-68, Rowanwood Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
